sub_title: European Key Account Desk Expert at DHL Express
summary: The CIS program consists of a Foundation course and specialized modules for individual functions, such as sales and customs clearance and a world class Leadership curriculum. All courses provide a unique experiential experience and are facilitated by DHL Express executives and managers worldwide. The Foundation course has been attended by all current employees of the company and serves as the main induction program for new recruits. It takes them back through the entrepreneurial history of DHL, which was founded in 1969 by three far-sighted Californian businessmen, and the pioneering spirit and customer dedication that helped it grow into the world’s most international company. It also provides training on the fundamentals of international shipping, ensuring every employee, regardless of their role in the company, is equipped to consult customers on successful cross-border delivery.

school.name: Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
To effectively manage and control the European OtC processes for DHL’s largest Strategic and GCS customers, guaranteeing continuous customer satisfaction, elimination of errors at source and compliance to terms and conditions that impact key KPI’s such as DSO, Credit Notes, Bad Debt and % overdue.

To manage the data quality and needs of all customer accounts across Europe by liaising frequently with the customer, GCM, RCM and Local KAM, as well as local CMF departments.

To guarantee that all contractual conditions (exemptions, exceptions, invoice formats, invoice frequency, tariffs, payment terms, etc) are being applied correctly across all billing systems and to ensure consistency of OtC processes for the customer, by liaising with the required DVRA, Billing and CMF resources in each country.

To deal with all customer invoice related queries and to ensure that all issues are carefully analyzed and actions are taken to avoid any repetition of the root causes.

To ensure that the customer is contacted (phone or face to face) at the
appropriate intervals (according to treatment plans), that promises to pay are kept, that all queries are properly recorded and managed and that relevant collection systems are updated in an accurate, professional and understandable manner.

To build and maintain good and professional relationships with key internal and external stakeholders surrounding the managed customers.

To discuss, coordinate and escalate “relevant and significant” collection issues to the respective stakeholder (Express, GCS and FHS).

To be able to represent DHL in front of the customer, if and when necessary, to negotiate any invoice related issues and contractual conditions (ensuring that all relevant data and knowledge has been gathered prior to any meetings with a customer).

To continuously monitor the ageing and guarantee optimal behavior of the overall customer portfolio, ensuring all individual targets are consistently met.
profile_positions.title: European Key Account Desk Expert

profile_positions.title: European Key Account Desk

profile_positions.description: Actively managing and coordinating Cash collection and Query Handling for an assigned Duty VAT Cash shipments in alignment with DP DHL process guidelines and policies in an efficient and cost effective manner. Providing high customer quality standards and enable effective Duty/VAT receivable collection.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader Duty/VAT

profile_positions.description:
During study friends came up with an idea: organising a Festival for "our generation" in "our own backyard", called: Pisart Festival Eijsden. After the first sketches they asked friends to join them. I did and we started with a group of five enthusiastic (overall) students, each doing what they did best. My field was conducting Commercial practises such as: marketingplan, communications, accountmanaging, business plan and sponsorships.

Lately I handed over my tasks to another friend (Jorn Blanksma), and are now Accountmanaging my nearest Sponsorships.

Unfortunately Pisart Festival Eijsden has stopped: http://www.pisartfestival.nl/2015/#features. How great it was to build up something so beautiful and unique with friends and family. Feel, hear and see Pisart... in our hearts from now on.
profile_positions.title: Sponsor committee

profile_positions.description:
Unamic/HCN is de grootste facilitaire dienstverlener in de Benelux voor het uitbesteden van klantcontactprocessen. Met meer dan 2.500 medewerkers en 14 vestigingen in Nederland, België, Suriname en Turkije legt, onderhoudt, managed en verbetert Unamic/HCN het klantcontact met de eindgebruikers van haar opdrachtgevers. 

De outsourcing van de klantenservice, het inbound- en/of outbound verkoopkanaal, de technische helpdesk en het verwerken van back office activiteiten betekent voor bedrijven:

1. Een hogere klanttevredenheid door een betere klantbeleving
2. Minder zorgen door de samenwerking met een solide en ervaren partner
3. Lagere kosten door innovatie en de mogelijkheid om activiteiten offshore uit te voeren
4. Meer tijd en aandacht voor de eigen kernactiviteiten

Unamic/HCN is onderdeel van ACS, a Xerox Company. Via ACS is Xerox in staat uitgebreide business process outsourcing en IT-outsourcing diensten, inclusief data processing, HR benefits management, financiële ondersteuning en customer relationship management services voor commerciële en overheidsorganisaties wereldwijd te bieden. Xerox Corporation is met 133.000 mensen actief in meer dan 160 landen.
profile_positions.title: Team leader

profile_positions.description: De klantcontacten binnen Declaratieservice gaan primair over de afhandeling van declaraties. De communicatie vindt plaats via telefoon, e-mail of brief. Over locaties heen werk ik nauw samen met drie collega teamleiders op de locaties Breda, Tilburg en Goes. Uitvoeren van alle voorkomende  HRM-taken binnen het team. Werving en selectie, het voeren van periodieke functionering- en beoordelingsgesprekken, verzuimpreventie en verzuimbegeleiding. Stimuleren en coachen van de medewerkers in hun persoonlijke ontwikkeling en zorg dragen voor het behoudt van kennis. Doen van voorstellen voor het beleid binnen het eigen vakgebied en vertalen van het divisie- en afdelingsbeleid in de vorm van een eigen teamplan naar verbeteracties en –doelstellingen voor de korte en de middellange termijn. Op basis van verwacht werkaanbod een jaarplan opstellen.Bewaken van het budget evenals de kwaliteit van de dienstverlening door de medewerkers. Evalueren van resultaten op basis van normen en servicedoelstellingen en bijsturen waar nodig. Samen met de andere teamleiders voortdurend de personele capaciteit afstemmen op het verwachte werkaanbod en daarmee ook primair verantwoordelijk voor het behalen van alle beoogde servicelevels. Rapporteren aan de manager en desgewenst participeren in projecten zowel binnen als buiten de eigen afdeling.
profile_positions.title: teamleider Declaratieservice

profile_positions.description:
Amazing company with nice colleagues, great products, high quality and enormous potential.

Summertime: full of Sports. Also the European Cup, join our Pool at http://ek2012.libelnet.nl.

profile_positions.description: DataLabel has a range of labels which helps (recreation) entrepreneurs in their daily work. Simplifying payments, e-mail marketing, customer service through callerID, rentals and more.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Accountmanager

profile_positions.description:
* Managing the Reception and Facilities team in both Maastricht and Roermond (6 fte).
* Prepare, plan, coordinate and monitor the areas of ​​cleaning, catering, Reception, maintenance work (contracts), design requirements, fire alarm systems and alarm systems.
* Ensure the implementation of various activities in the field of building maintenance and interior design.
* Ensure the maintenance of the buildings, surroundings and technical installations.
* Leading the Refurbsihment project of Maastricht site (total of 6.000 square meters) upgrade to Premises standards.
* Checking of incoming invoices and submit for approval by consent.
* Contact with Local Fire Department regarding requirements.
* Participating in standby service outside office hours and on weekends in case of emergencies.
* Performing (minor) repairs
* Liaising with other tenants in case of emergencies, nuisance.
* Numerical and analytical skills.
* Supporting the Facility Director in various ways (CCP, Management Meetings, conference calls, Premises).
profile_positions.title: Facility Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Coordinating the facility issues, managing the reception team, and member of the Management Team.
profile_positions.title: Facility Coordinator

profile_positions.description: At first I started as Teamleader for a callcenterteam regarding customer service for VGZ's Health Insurance clients, the team size was 10-15 people. At last I was teamleader for a new project: Insurance Administration and the leading the team that was responsible for Processing Claims with a team size from 15-20 people and being the First Point of Contact for VGZ.
profile_positions.title: Teamleader

volunteer_experiences.description:
Stichting Jeugdwerk Riekelt is a wonderful group of passionate volunteers. We are regularly organizing activities for children in our and nearby villages. Also their are activities for them together with their friends and families. 

I started as treasurer of the foundation and handed over the treasurer tasks in 2014 and became a board member. The foundation organises local activities for children from 4-14 years old as well as family activities.

Most famous are the Familietocht, Groete Broonk, Carnaval, Sinterklaas and Herdertjestocht. Check us out at Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/jeugdwerkriekelt) or website (http://www.jeugdwerkriekelt.nl)

The Parent Council is a group of parents selected by all parents in the school to represent their views. Parent Councils have an important role to play in school improvement by ensuring that the parental perspective is represented and taken into account.

The Parent Council helps to create an environment where all parents know that their views matter, and where they feel confident and comfortable putting them forward. They work on behalf of all parents to discuss educational matters that are of importance to all.
